title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
description: When I start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and try to access a URL, the server returns an HTTP code 200 OK response with no content, instead of the expected HTTP error 404. This behavior is observed in the downloaded Tomcat 7 version 7.0.0beta.
OB: When I start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and access a URL, it returns an HTTP code 200 OK response with no content.
EB: When I start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and access a URL, it should return an HTTP error 404 indicating that the requested resource is not found.
SR:
1. Download the Tomcat 7 version 7.0.0beta
2. Start a Tomcat instance with no webapps deployed
3. Access a URL
4. Verify that the server returns an HTTP code 200 OK response with no content instead of an HTTP error 404.
